text:
="preserve">M.A.S. Alex Asmasoebrata (23 June 1951 – 2 January 2021) was an Indonesian politician and autoracer. He was born in Jakarta, Indonesia. From 1992 to 1997, he was a member of the People's Consultative Assembly. Asmasoebrata was a member of the People's Consultative Assembly. He was a member of the Democratic Party.
Asmasoebrata died of pancreatic and heart cancer on 2 January 2021 in Jakarta at the age of 69.
